'''1.16.101''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}}, released for Android, iOS, iPadOS, Fire OS on November 23, 2020, and Nintendo Switch on November 24, 2020,<ref>{{tweet|Mega_Spud|1330918208350654465|Happy Monday! There's a Minecraft hotfix on the way today ... We're still looking into some more bugs that you've reported, & will let you know when we have more updates! Please report new bugs at bugs.mojang.com|November 23, 2020}}</ref> which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360052372592|title=Minecraft - 1.16.101 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=November 23, 2020}}</ref> This version is still compatible with all Bedrock platforms running on [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.100|1.16.100]].

== Fixes ==
* Fixed players unable to connect to Realms when playing on cellular data on devices with cellular data. ({{bug|MCPE-55405}})
* Fixed Minecoins not appearing after purchase until after restarting the game.
